verbs.description: There [V: 's] [ARG1: a wild conspiracy theory that Melania Trump has been replaced by a body double in public appearances] .
There 's a wild conspiracy theory that Melania Trump [V: has] been replaced by a body double in public appearances .
There 's a wild conspiracy theory that Melania Trump has [V: been] replaced by a body double in public appearances .
